SELECT c.*, e.name AS masterName, (case when now()>c.end_date then '已结课' when c.begin_date>now() then '未结课' else '进行中' end ) AS status FROM clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.end_date BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
order by c.end_date desc
